org.apache.james.user.api

Interface UsersRepositoryManagementMBean

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UsersRepositoryManagement

    public interface UsersRepositoryManagementMBean
    Expose user account management functionality through JMX.

           String password)
             throws Exception
        Adds a user to this mail server.

        boolean verifyExists(String userName)
                     throws Exception
        Check if a user exists with the given name.
        Parameters:
        userName - The name of the user
        Returns:
        TRUE, if the user exists
        Throws:
        UsersRepositoryException - if error

void unsetForwardAddress(String userName)
